content:
Geometry Research Groups

This page collects pointers to home pages of research groups working in discrete and computational geometry or related areas.
  • U. Bern, Forschungsgruppe Computergeometrie
  • U. Cantabria, Computational Algebra and Geometry
  • Duke U., Center for Geometric Computing
  • U. East Anglia, Computational Geometry Project
  • Euler Institute for Discrete Mathematics and its Applications
  • FernUniversität Hagen, Gesellschaft für Informatik - Fachgruppe 0.1.2, Algorithmische Geometrie
  • Hungarian Acad. of Sciences, Mathematical Inst., Convex and Computational Geometry Research Group
  • Iowa State U. Visualization Laboratory
  • U. Kaiserslautern, Arbeitsgruppe Computer Aided Design und Algorithmische Geometrie
  • McGill U. Computational Geometry Laboratory
  • U. Massachusetts, Amherst, Center for Geometry, Analysis, Numerics, and Graphics
  • U. Minnesota Geometry Center
  • U. Münster, Algorithmische Geometrie
  • Nagoya U., Hirata Lab.
  • NASA Langley Res. Ctr., Geometry Laboratory
  • U. North Carolina, Chapel Hill, Research in Geometric, Symbolic and Scientific Computing
  • Northwestern U., Geometric Object Manipulation/Modeling System Project
  • CNR Pisa, Visual Computing Group
  • U. Politècnica de Catalynya, Research Group in Computational Geometry and Combinatorial Geometry
  • Queen's University Computational Geometry Laboratory
  • Rice U. Computer Graphics and Geometric Design Group
  • U. di Roma (Tre), Algorithms and Computational Geometry Group
  • INRIA Sophia Antipolis, PRISME - Geometry, Algorithms and Robotics
  • U. South Florida, Geometric Modeling and Computer Graphics
  • SUNY Stony Brook, Computational Geometry
  • Computational Geometry at U. Waterloo

Part of Geometry in Action, a collection of applications of computational geometry.
David Eppstein, Theory Group, ICS, UC Irvine.

Last update: .
